function_call.name: classify_mitigation
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_mitigations":[{"name":"Review and adhere to verified terms and conditions","category":"Promote verified information","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Implement strict qualification criteria to ensure that only experienced individuals participate in the survey.","category":"Staff training / upskilling","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Implement validation measures to ensure the objectivity and impartiality of the selection process. use multiple sources of data to confirm the findings from participant engagement.","category":"Validation of control sampler, double-checking testing procedures, and regular verification of testing accuracy","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Integrate health and hygiene experts into the decision-making process. conduct thorough risk assessments for each development change and paradigm shift to identify potential impacts on contagious disease propagation.","category":"Social activities / facilitatie social interactions","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Regular security audits and updates, multi-factor authentication, secure development practices.","category":"Facilitate transparent communication","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Implement automated data replication processes, regular data integrity checks, disaster recovery planning.","category":"Multiple-use / modular designs","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Implementation of secure storage solutions, encryption of medical data","category":"Secure data transmission protocols and use encryption to minimize the risk","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Implementation of secure data transfer protocols, use of vpn or encrypted channels","category":"Monitor and control indoor air quality","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Implement secure data transmission protocols and use encryption to minimize the risk","category":"Greywater management","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Conduct rigorous clinical trials and research to assess the safety and efficacy of experimental drugs for covid-19 treatment","category":"Clinical trials and research to establish safety and efficacy","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Clinical trials and research to establish safety and efficacy","category":"Clinical trials and research to establish safety and efficacy","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Thorough clinical trials, post-marketing surveillance, and rigorous monitoring of patient outcomes to identify and address any adverse effects.","category":"Early detection","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Conducting adequate studies with realistic eligibility criteria and patient stratification","category":"Realistic eligibility double-checking testing procedures, and regular verification of testing accuracy","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Verification of parameter values through sensitivity analysis and comparison with
